alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 9:20PM EDT until July 19 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL AIKEN AND WESTERN ORANGEBURG COUNTIES... At 920 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Aiken State Park, or 13 miles east of Aiken Mall, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Aiken, Aiken Mall, New Ellenton, Jackson, Citizens Park, Aiken Municipal Airport, Aiken State Park, Wagener, Windsor, Aiken Gopher Tortoise Heritage Preserve, Hopeland Gardens, Savannah River Site Badge Office, Boyd Pond Park and New Holland. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 21 and 31. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
